description.oldValue:
Teams Rooms devices that are eligible for
Windows 11, will receive the Windows 11 release. Devices that are not eligible,
due to an incompatible processor, will continue on Windows 10 per hardware
support policy.
description.newValue: Teams Rooms devices that are eligible for Windows 11, will receive the Windows 11 release. Devices that are not eligible, due to an incompatible processor, will continue on Windows 10 per hardware support policy. Note: We apologize for the shifted timeline.  We do appreciate your patience and understanding.
